item.title: Eight dead in lightning strikes across Telangana
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Hyderabad: At least eight people died after being struck by lightning in different parts of the state on Wednesday. Two more suffered injuries.Three persons died in Nirmal district, and another three died when struck by lightning in Jogulamba Gadwal district. Two more died in Khammam district.In Jogulamba Gadwal district, a 40-year-old woman, Sowbhagya, a 20-year-old youth, Suresh, and a 22-year-old young woman died instantaneously when struck by lightning in Bhumpuram village in Aija mandal...]]>
